alert.note: Alert for Southern Jackson; Transylvania (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 12 at 2:01PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN STEPHENS...EASTERN RABUN...SOUTHWESTERN TRANSYLVANIA...SOUTHERN JACKSON AND OCONEE COUNTIES THROUGH 245 PM EDT... At 201 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles east of Clayton to 14 miles northeast of Clarkesville to 4 miles north of Toccoa. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Seneca, Walhalla, Toccoa, Westminster, Salem, Lake Jocassee, Devils Fork State Park, Gorges State Park, Tallulah Gorge State Park, and Oconee State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
